name: Opening Social: Sponsored by Canopy Tax
description: Our first event of the semester! Come listen to an awesome presentation by Canopy to kick of the new school year. As always, there will be food and door prizes.

name: Resume Workshop: Sponsored by Microsoft
description: This resume workshop is sponsored by Microsoft. Come learn from the Microsoft recruiter what companies look for when they first see your resume.

name: Programming Competition: Sponsored by Google
description: This programming competition will be a little bit different from the Google Games that were hosted last year, but still a lot of fun! If you can't find a team, no worries, just hop on the Slack channel and make new friends.

name: Bowling Social: Sponsored by Pariveda
description: Pariveda sponsors this super fun event where students and recruiters can kick back and get to know each other in a very relaxed way.

name: Recruitment Dinner
description: Sit down and enjoy a catered meal with industry recruiters. This is a great opportunity to network! Register here before spots run out! You must pay your dues before attending the event. At least 24 recruiters are coming from companies like Sandia National Laboratories, Chicago Venture Partners, Facebook, Microsoft, ExxonMobil, Qualtrics, Zion's Bank, Pariveda, Lucidchart, SimpleNexus, Goldman Sachs, Chief Architect, & Rincon Research. Dress business casual.

name: Programming Competition: Sponsored by Lucid Software
description: This is a contest between BYU, USU, and the U of U. Check back for updates as we get closer to the event. Register here!

name: 12-hour Hackathon
description: This will by our 12-hour hackathon this year! See the event page for more information!

name: Club Meeting: Sponsored by Symantic
description: A club meeting sponsored by Symantic. As always, there will be food and door prizes.

name: Closing Social: Sponsored by Apple
description: Fall Semester's closing social will be hosted by Apple. They are super excited to bring a presentation on personal branding and storytelling. This will be the last event of the semester.

name: Ninja Challenge
description: A series of difficult challenges for the winter break designed to test your skills! Finish all of them for a prize.
